task.title: Making a Project in Oxygen Content Fusion
task.shortdesc: In this step, you will learn how to create a project on Oxygen Content Fusion.

taskbody.context: This task includes learning how to create a project file on Oxygen Content Fusion that links to the repository you created in GitHub.

step.cmd: Hover over the top left corner of the screen and select the "Projects" tab
Click "New Project" in Oxygen Content Fusion
Copy the link from your repository into Oxygen
Get a GitHub token to connect it to the GitHub repository
Give the token Read and Write access under "Contents"
